url-rfc5724.description: url representing SMS using RFC 5724 (not url contained in the SMS which should use an url object)

from.description: Phone number used to send the SMS

sent-date.description: Initial sent date of the SMS

description: Short Message Service (SMS) object template describing one or more SMS message. Restriction of the initial format 3GPP 23.038 GSM character set doesn't apply.
name: short-message-service
